html:
5.11.17  9:40 pm   you misspelled uruguay wait that's not a question

     sorry about that, i actually thought it was uraguay
5.11.17  9:33 pm   Why don't you answer me?!

5.11.17  9:28 pm   what would you do with eternal life?

     everything

5.11.17  9:26 pm   do you consider yourself a hypocrite?

     yes and no

5.11.17  9:25 pm   I know you're not going to put ads on your videos, but I'm poor and want to support you by watching a silly ad so you get money.

     i appreciate that, and i'm sorry that option is not available

5.11.17  9:19 pm   i like your jingles. are you planning to release an album?

     oh hell yeah. what makes things more complicated is there's no rules anymore about how many songs that's supposed to be, and where

5.11.17  9:18 pm   are problems you have today rooted in your childhood

     sure. although i think i found a way to make the best of most of them
5.11.17  9:18 pm   where did you get the idea to do the history of japan?

5.11.17  8:52 pm   was the globe animated entirely in blender?

     no, i abandoned blender early on, after having a spectacular existential crisis about its file saving system

5.11.17  8:52 pm   We have identical humor and I find you attractive. How can we get to know each other more? ;)

     option 1 is i post this and tell you to email me. then you and many other people email me. and if i don't have time to respond to all of them, they will post angry comments on here. option 2 is to not post this and i never hear from you

5.11.17  8:51 pm   do you prefer to be called a musician, a youtuber, or both

     musician. i prefer not to label people based on what sites they may have used. you could call me other things too, but musician is accurate for sure

5.11.17  8:42 pm   how do i get a job in advertising after applying over 700+ times

     i think you will have much better success if you apply to 700 jobs, instead of applying 700 times to 1 job

5.11.17  8:38 pm   are you working on a song now

     oh hell yeah

5.11.17  8:35 pm   with hotewig out, is alphabet shuffle making its way to this page?

     not this page, but the videos page and the songs page. likely not until the new songs start coming out

5.11.17  8:32 pm   why does 'car' show up often in your songs? like 9 different times

     i think you will find that it has been showing up a lot in popular music in general for at least the past 50 years. it is just a fun easy word to say, and a fun mode of transportation. too bad the fuel makes such a mess

5.11.17  8:27 pm   Why don't you do the "reality" things anymore?

     i do

5.11.17  8:13 pm   Why does rain work?

     because water can have drastically different weights
5.11.17  8:12 pm   Now What?

5.11.17  8:05 pm   Is time travel possible?

     so far it's the only type of travel that's possible

5.11.17  7:38 pm   Did you sit by the computer or did you go do other stuff when you published the latest video to see the number of views?

     i tried to stay as far away from the internet as possible

5.11.17  7:37 pm   when you say ur gonna make videos of a more medium length now, do ya mean videos of like alphabet shuffle length or more i'm crazy / it's raining length? or somewhere in between? or somewhere else entirely? or whatever?

     i would like to focus on time lengths between 20 seconds and 4 minutes

5.11.17  7:34 pm   Does hitting #1 trending video on YouTube with a 19 minute video motivate you to create LONGER videos?

     no

5.11.17  7:30 pm   at 5.11.17 5:12 am, does that mean that you wont make 19 second videos or 8.2834729304 second videos ever again

     i need to catch up on medium lengths projects first, until i no longer feel like they have been hopelessly neglected

5.11.17  7:26 pm   Why do we think?

     because it's possible

5.11.17  7:06 pm   hi bill, i really respect your work. keep on keepin' on. question: do you think public transportation has a big impact on society outside of trains and airlines? love you. ser?na

     yes, particularly busses

5.11.17  7:06 pm   how do I unbake a cake

     that's a great question, i'm not sure

5.11.17  7:05 pm   i wonder, since your most popular videos are about history, how will you find something new if you already did the history of the earth. btw i love ur shit.

     it is important to remember that before my first history video, i was already popular for something else

5.11.17  6:59 pm   Your singing, short length videos are great. How do you make your voice sound as if there's more than just you singing? Do you record yourself doing singing the same thing and then put it together?

     yes

5.11.17  6:55 pm   Why don't you hire someone to make a proper website?

     i think this website is proper. but i respect your opinion
5.11.17  6:50 pm   What inspired you to hake these videos?

5.11.17  6:48 pm   what way did you count the years in HOTEWIG?

     panic

5.11.17  6:47 pm   you didn't even mention Nepal :(

     i'm sorry

5.11.17  6:44 pm   Did you expect people to tell you all the stuff you "forgot about",

     oh hell yeah

      and how do you feel about people reminding you what you didn't have the capability to include?

     a little bit insane, because i feel like i already heard them reminding me during the 3 months of agony last summer when i was trying to include as much as possible while also keeping it as balanced as possible. which is why it is important to hide from comments all together

      Congrats, by the way. 11 months beautifully spent.
5.11.17  6:39 pm   How long did it take you to make your newest video?

5.11.17  6:35 pm   How come when you try to look at everything in a global context nothing makes sense?

     you might be missing out on some very obvious truths that might suddenly hit you at some point
5.11.17  6:33 pm   What do you like to do in your time when you aren't making videos, songs, or answering questions?
5.11.17  6:31 pm   Can a sentence that doesn't end with a question mark still be considered a question through inference.

5.11.17  6:21 pm   What was the instrumental used to introduce the United States in your "history of japan" video?

     i made all the music specifically for the video

5.11.17  6:16 pm   Why are your videos about history?

     most of them are not, but it was something i wanted to try

      Are you a teacher?

     no

5.11.17  6:03 pm   how do i know what i like

     i guess you'll just have to guess
5.11.17  5:55 pm   Are you cool?

5.11.17  5:51 pm   I noticed someone mentioning that the wave particle duality concluded that nothing would exist without life. This is absolutely untrue, an observer as defined by physics is very, very different to what the traditional sense of the word means

     the way i would think of it is, everything exists. but life is the only one who ever notices

5.11.17  5:50 pm   why did you focus so much on humans when the majority of the history of the world didn't have any humans?

     because humans are my target audience

5.11.17  5:44 pm   Are you optimistic on humanity's future ?

     yes

5.11.17  5:44 pm   Great vid. Not much about native north americans - reason?

     the reason i didn't mention everything in that video is because the video was not long enough to mention everything

5.11.17  5:36 pm   why do you use helvetica as a font?

     i find i get more creative mileage when i don't try use interesting fonts, but instead focus on the position, movement, size, color, meaning, and music. helvetica is the default font in the text program i use, so it is a natural choice when i don't want to choose
5.11.17  5:33 pm   zombie apocalypse or alien invasion?
5.11.17  5:12 pm   Plan to start using the reality page again?

5.11.17  5:06 pm   Hello you misspelled Uruguay on the map of Latin America in the video

     sorry about that, i actually thought it was uraguay

5.11.17  4:54 pm   Are you an artist?

     i've never been tested
